content.text:
# List of haplotype estimation and genotype imputation software

This is a list of notable software for haplotype estimation and genotype imputation.
Alphabetical order:
* [https://alphagenes.roslin.ed.ac.uk/wp/software-2/alphaimpute AlphaImpute]
* [http://faculty.washington.edu/browning/beagle/beagle.html Beagle]
* [https://dx.doi.org/10.1186/1471-2156-13-85 cnF2freq]
* [http://www.giga.ulg.ac.be/cms/c_20703/fr/unit-of-animal-genomics-software DAGPHASE]
* [https://data.broadinstitute.org/alkesgroup/Eagle/ Eagle]
* [http://stephenslab.uchicago.edu/software.html#fastphase fastPHASE]
* [https://dx.doi.org/10.3835/plantgenome2014.05.0023 FILLIN] (part of [http://www.maizegenetics.net/#!tassel/c17q9 TASSEL])
* [http://www.aps.uoguelph.ca/~msargol/fimpute/ FImpute]
* [http://aipl.arsusda.gov/software/findhap/ findhap]
* [https://dx.doi.org/10.3835/plantgenome2014.05.0023 FSFHap] (part of [http://www.maizegenetics.net/#!tassel/c17q9 TASSEL])
* [https://code.google.com/p/hapi-ur/ HAPI-UR]
* [http://mathgen.stats.ox.ac.uk/impute/impute_v2.html IMPUTE2]
* [https://dx.doi.org/10.1534/genetics.110.113936 LDMIP]
* [http://www.g3journal.org/content/5/11/2383 LinkImpute]
* [https://bmcgenomics.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12864-017-3873-5 LinkImputeR]
* [http://www.sph.umich.edu/csg/abecasis/MACH/download/ MACH]
* [http://stephenslab.uchicago.edu/software.html#phase PHASE]
* [https://dx.doi.org/10.2135/cropsci2014.09.0648 PlantImpute]
* [https://mathgen.stats.ox.ac.uk/genetics_software/shapeit/shapeit.html SHAPEIT2]
* [https://jmarchini.org/shapeit3/ SHAPEIT3]
* [https://odelaneau.github.io/shapeit4/ SHAPEIT4]
* [http://www.genetics.ucla.edu/software/simwalk SimWalk2]
* [https://www-gene.cimr.cam.ac.uk/staff/clayton/software/ SNPHAP]
*[http://www.nature.com/doifinder/10.1038/ng.3594 STITCH]
* [https://whatshap.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ WhatsHap]
* [https://github.com/vibansal/HapCUT2 HapCUT2]
* [https://github.com/sinamajidian/Hap10 Hap10]
* [https://github.com/MinzhuXie/H-PoPG H-PoP]
References
